00037 @implementation NSData (NimbusCore)

00041 
00046 - (NSString *)md5Hash {
00047   unsigned char result[CC_MD5_DIGEST_LENGTH];
00048   CC_MD5([self bytes], [self length], result);
00049 
00050   return [NSString stringWithFormat:
00051           @"%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x",
00052           result[0], result[1], result[2], result[3], result[4], result[5], result[6], result[7],
00053           result[8], result[9], result[10], result[11], result[12], result[13], result[14],
00054           result[15]
00055           ];
00056 }
00057 
00058 
00060 
00065 - (NSString *)sha1Hash {
00066   unsigned char result[CC_SHA1_DIGEST_LENGTH];
00067   CC_SHA1([self bytes], [self length], result);
00068 
00069   return [NSString stringWithFormat:
00070           @"%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x%02x",
00071           result[0], result[1], result[2], result[3], result[4], result[5], result[6], result[7],
00072           result[8], result[9], result[10], result[11], result[12], result[13], result[14],
00073           result[15], result[16], result[17], result[18], result[19]
00074           ];
00075 }

00078 @end
